name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	          Content
1	2.18, 2.19	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
2	2.25, 2.26	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
3	3.3, 3.4	         Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic  Theory
4	3.10, 3.11	Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic Theory
5	3.17, 3.18	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts
6	3.24, 3.25	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts  
Exam 1 (3.25)
7	3.31, 4.1	Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
8	4.7, 4.8	Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
9	4.14, 4.15	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
10	4.21, 4.22	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
11	4.28, 4.29	Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids
12	5.5, 5.6	Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids         
Exam 2 (5.6)
13	5.12, 5.13	Chapter 17 Properties of Solutions
14	5.19, 5.20	Chapter 17 Properties of Solutions
15	5.26, 5.27	Chapter 18 The Representative Elements: Group 1A through 4 A
16	6.2, 6.3	Chapter 19 The Representative Elements: Group 5A through 8 A
17	6.9, 6.10	Chapter 20 Transition Metals and Coordination chemistry
18	6.16, 6.17	Exam 3 (6.16)
materials: Zumdahl, Steven S., Chemical Principles; Fifth Edition, Houghton Mifflin Company
